Specimen Type(s): Fresh capillary whole blood from the finger
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VISGENEER eBcarryon Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing electrochemical biosensor technology for blood glucose measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger to aid in monitoring diabetes control; not intended for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or use on neonates.
